text: Firestorm is the name of many fictional superheroes appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. Ronnie Raymond and Martin Stein were the first incarnation in Firestorm, the Nuclear Man 1 (March 1978) and were created by Gerry Conway and Al Milgrom. Jason Rusch debuted as a modern update of the character in Firestorm (vol. 3) #1 (July 2004), and was created by Dan Jolley and ChrisCross. == In other media == Firestorm is featured in The CW's Arrowverse, played by Robbie Amell, Victor Garber, and Franz Drameh. ==References== Category:DC Comics superheroes
title: Firestorm (character)
